author: James Walker
comment: Your program is full-featured with a relatively easy user interface! The interface is only slightly complicated because your program is so rich in features. I am thoroughly impressed that you, after the add free period, only ask $3.49. Thank you so much for a wonderful app at an incredibly affordable price. My wife and I have shelved Messages (the SMS app that came installed on our Galaxy S8 phones) and use Textra exclusively.

reply.author: Delicious
reply.content: Thanks for the kind review and supporting Textra SMS James.

author: Tyson Heaton
comment: Can't say enough good things. It's interface is beautiful and simple but with plenty of customizations. I don't pay to unlock/remive ads on many apps but I did with this one because I want to see it supported and it's my daily driver.

reply.author: Delicious
reply.content: Thanks for supporting Textra SMS Tyson.

author: Ben Pagano
comment: I came from imessage to Samsung's texting app and I eventually stumbled onto this app and I'm blown away by how customizable EVERYTHING is. I'm actually stunned. Notifications are so custom that I almost never actually go into the app to use it. Free trial does expire and ads do arrive but I instantly purchased the full app. It was cheap and I'll GLADLY support these devs.

author: Camilo Ruiz
comment: Wonderful app I've had installed since its first release. Went premium instantly. Can't say there's a more fluid or feature filled messaging application.

author: Josh Marlette
comment: Great! The main thing I can see that it could benefit from would be a location sharing feature. I used that a lot with Android Messaging and miss that function. The gif search isn't always great but it's way better than Android Messaging.

reply.author: Delicious
reply.content: Feedbacn noted with thanks Josh. Currently you may share location via Textra using Google Map.

author: Matthew Reik
comment: Love the app. Please add an archive feature along with the delete. Also make the swipe to go back a little more sensitive and not require such a long throw. Consider adding a private inbox.

reply.author: Delicious
reply.content: Thank you and noted on your feedback Matthew.

author: Bacon Chalupa
comment: Weird bug has showed up that makes the text go off screen. 1 star until fixed. Makes texting a chore

reply.author: Delicious
reply.content: Please send us a screenshot to help@textra.me, thanks.

author: Dylan Conger
comment: So far I love the app and I'm thinking paying for it with no ads I just need to know if that is a monthly payment or a 1 time payment. If it's 1 time I'm all over it.

reply.author: Delicious
reply.content: One time fee for life Dylan, thanks for the kind review!

author: Carlos Egea
comment: This app has everything and more, has great Gifs and voice text for safety and great group sharing.   The developers will add anyting you ask for if it makes sense!

author: Elba Roark
comment: Something is going on with the Textra app, as there are some messages that don't even come through it and will only be picked up by the stock messaging app on my ATT LG G6.

reply.author: Delicious
reply.content: Sure we can help, please email help@textra.me for assistance, thanks heaps.

author: Dav Yep
comment: Update: over a year and still no attempt to support RCS. Moving to Android messages until this is implemented then maybe I'll think about coming back. One major thing that stops me from making this my default texting app is the lack of support for enhanced features that relate to Rich Communication Services like seeing when people have read your messages, lets you know when the other person is typing, using data to send messages instead of SMS protocol, high resolution photo sharing, and everything else that RCS improves on over traditional sms texting.

reply.author: Delicious
reply.content: It's not possible yet. Google need to release APIs for Android and they have not done so, and perhaps never will. So in less your Google, no developer can offer RCS on Android (which is why no developer has, check out all 37 SMS apps on Google Play, none, apart from Google's has RCS). Why? Because it's not possible.

author: Emilian Sisu
comment: I used to like this app a lot. Recently I stopped receiving my messages. So I had to switch

reply.author: Delicious
reply.content: Hi Emilian, please email help@textra.me for an immediate solution! Thanks we'd appreciate that.

author: Chris Jeffrey
comment: Great texting app does everything I need done plus a few more I didn't know I needed.

author: Abdullah Ehsan
comment: Textra was a very good messaging app but its new update is not good enough as its quick reply opens the conversation of someone else

reply.author: Delicious
reply.content: Sure we can help, please email help@textra.me for assistance, thanks Abdullah.

author: Vida Hunt
comment: Nice features especially how the backgrounds can be personalized, many cool themes to choose from, easy to use & love the skin tone emojis!

reply.author: Delicious
reply.content: Thanks Vida! Enjoy Textra.

author: Rick Ward
comment: This is the best app out of the apps similar to this that I have tried. This is because it works well and it so customizable.

author: Jessica Humphrey
comment: Replaced the other app I was using and I don't regret it. It's fast, beautiful and works so much better than the others I've used. I even became a pro user!

author: Princess Mariel
comment: Please samsung emoji please 😊

author: Neil Hassman
comment: Makes texting easy, looks damn nice, too!

reply.author: Delicious
reply.content: Thanks Neil! Hope for your 5 stars soon.

author: Kenneth McInnes
comment: Great SMS app. The features are great.

author: Shubham Gola
comment: Awsm app

author: Larry Chen
comment: Great alternative from Google message.

author: LaRonn Brown
comment: Hands down best SMS app I've ever used. It has so many options to customize your experience, and a great design to top it off!

author: Jennifer Bailey
comment: Edit: 2017 update   This is the app I used years ago when I had Android. I went over to the land of iPhone for a few years and just recently switched back to Android with a Note 8. This is the first app I downloaded, and it's just as great as I remember, and in face has gotten better (which I thought it was amazing to begin with, so that's quite a feat!).  The features are amazing, the customization is great. It's seamless.   Simple, streamlined, clean app that works just like the stock app SHOULD.  Pop ups,  group messaging,  everything just works amazingly well.  Definite five stars :-)

reply.author: Delicious
reply.content: Thanks Jenn!

author: David Masterson
comment: First time user and so far I'm very happy with this app. There are a couple of things I do miss from the Samsung messaging app. First, I use the facility, a lot, that allows me to simply bring the phone to my ear from within a text to dial a person. Secondly, on my Note 4 I could use the volume buttons to increase and decrease the size of font in a text. A definite 5 stars if these 2 features could be added.

reply.author: Delicious
reply.content: Feedback noted and appreciated David.

author: Vandrea Davis
comment: The photo viewer is better. I like that I can preview the pictures in my gallery before I add them by holding my finger over  their icons. Why that years later you guys still haven't integrated an easy way to preview photos you just took before you send it though!? Also videos.like if I record a video within the app it would be nice to be able to view before sending it. Also is there a way to add saved videos in the same way you can add saved photos?  I haven't found a way to add videos from my gallery...

reply.author: Delicious
reply.content: Thanks heaps for your feedback Vandrea. Currently you may select the intended video from your Gallery - share via Textra. Perhaps 4 stars until then as 2 stars kills our rating.

author: Ali Najafi
comment: Wow! I wished I could give 5 stars again. Recent updates are wonderful.  Beautiful design with lots of customizations. I wish it had an option to show a contact's messages with different numbers in one thread.   Edit: New version contains ads on top of the conversations list – regression.  Edit2: A Delete button on the notification to delete the message without opening the app would be great.

reply.author: Delicious
reply.content: FYI Ali, we have added "Manage Ads" option so you can choose the ad position you prefer. Meanwhile, delete button on notification is coming very soon. :)

author: Flash Nova
comment: *Update*: So I've been using this app for months and months and I can't recommend it enough. Support for different emojis, high customizability, and awesome developer support. I paid for the pro version and I would do it again in a heartbeat any day. If you're reading this to see if the app is worth your time just go ahead and give it a shot because it %100 is 👍👍

reply.author: Delicious
reply.content: Thanks Flash! :)

author: Kezia Silva
comment: I've been using Textra for two years now and love it!! I love how easy it is to customize. I've never had an issue before. However, i noticed recently that sometimes I would not receive people's text and they would ask if I received their text. This is how I know something was wrong with my Textra. I had to use the stock message app to avoid missing anyone's text. I really would like to start using Textra again since it's more convenient and easy to use. Please help me resolve this issue!! It's the only thing that's preventing me from using Textra as my default message app.

reply.author: Delicious
reply.content: We can help, pls email help@textra.me for immediate assistance, thanks Kezia.

author: Zach Schmidt
comment: Still the best messaging app...by far!   I've tried a bunch of SMS apps, and this one is my favorite. I had previously tried others and went back to stock Samsung Messages app. But I'm glad I found Textra, which is now my default SMS app!! Simple to use, customizable but not confusingly so, looks great, very fast. Great customer support, too. The ads are minimal and not invasive, but I'm still considering the small fee of 2.99 to remove them. Highly recommend!!!

reply.author: Delicious
reply.content: Million thanks for your kind review and support Zach! We really appreciate it. Enjoy Textra!

author: Layne Stidham
comment: It is one of the best! Two issues   1st. I can't send videos without backing out into my Gallery and using the share button. If you simply made it so videos appeared when you select the pictures tab (with play icons to make them understood as videos).  2nd. I can't have an image as my text background. I would like to have a picture of my cats when I text certain people or anyone at all.

reply.author: Delicious
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback on adding more customizations and features, we appreciate it! Rest assured lots more coming to Textra Layne!

comment: This app is so great, I absolutely love the customization. The only thing keeping me from giving a 5 star review is the fact that notifications don't seem to support the ambient display. Instead, they wake up the entire screen. If that gets fixed I will change my rating.  EDIT: Turns out a setting had been disabled which prevented ambient display from working. This app is perfect 👍🏽

reply.author: Delicious
reply.content: Noted, thanks for the heads-up!

author: Taylor Bombard
comment: Textra should be the default app for messages for the entire industry. Easy to use. Customizable. The features are pretty slick.  The only thing I wish it could do is out my messages on my computer so I could text from anywhere.  User since April 2016.  Edit: support team has helped me and said that Pushbullet is compatible with Textra.  Not my favorite solution, but still a solution!

reply.author: Delicious
reply.content: Thanks for the updated 5 stars Taylor.

author: Brian P
comment: This app is perfect! Works flawless! Has tons of options, can be customized with colors, fonts, etc. True Android & IPhone emojis, swipe to see timestamp on messages, Future Text people so you never forget birthdays/reminders, Quick reply popups, Text popup in floating window option so you can quick reply & not lose out on what you were doing (multi-task!), even send a quick voice message with the mic button, & so much more! I've tried many, but this is the best! Just add option to read a message out loud!

reply.author: Delicious
reply.content: Thanks heaps and we noted on your feedback Brian. Enjoy Textra.

author: Cassini Griffin
comment: Textra is the best kind of messaging app: it never fails to simply work. Sure, you can customize the look and feel to your liking, and sure, it always looks great when doing so, but when you get right down to it the app just works. That's what a messaging app should aspire to do - work. I don't want to fiddle with a badly designed app just to send a text - and with this app, I don't have to. definitely try it!

reply.author: Delicious
reply.content: Thanks heaps for your kind review and 5 stars Cassini. Enjoy Textra.

author: Ben Hardin
comment: This is the only app besides Verizon Messenger that allows me to use full sized pictures.  This app is a lot more customizable, though, as you can customize pretty much everything.  The screenshots made it seem like you could only have a dark background, but you can change pretty much every color in the app.  The only thing I miss with this app is sharing video.  Wish I didn't need to use another app for that.

reply.author: Delicious
reply.content: Thanks heaps for your kind review and 5 stars Ben. Enjoy Textra.

author: Mike Smith
comment: Why does the notification drop down list have "Mark as unread" instead of "Mark as Read". It seems to me that would be a very useful tool to avoid having to open the phone then open the app then open the message. I mean most SMS messages are so short the whole message is there in the drop version. Make the change and 5 stars. Update: The gurus of the app just emailed me with the fix for my suggestion (not really a complaint) and as promised, 5 stars. Thank you guys, gals.

reply.author: Delicious
reply.content: It's already there Mike, see Textra - settings - customize notifications -  mark as read - toggle opposite to the way you have set it now - press play top right to see it now stares mark as unread. Thanks and hope for your 5 stars soon.

author: Nancy Peterson
comment: Update: ONE MORE TIME! I've tried other apps with many more MILLIONS of users than yours. But I KEEP COMING BACK!! LOVE you guys!!! 💖💖   Update: Well, Textra, you'll be happy to know that I've tried everything else AND NOTHING COMPARES!!  Am more than happy to let tablet app go. (I can't use a texting app on my tablet anyway.) You do everything I need you to do BETTER than anyone else! I'll keep using you for a VERY long time!  Thanks!

reply.author: Delicious
reply.content: Noted Nancy and thanks for the 5 stars!

comment: Dear devs, can you please help me? Sometimes, i don't receive sms. My girlfriend just calls me whenever she already have sent many sms and i was not replying since i never received anything from her. Most of the times, i receive sms. But there is always a time in a day wherein i won't receive any sms. Otherwise, the app is really great! It is easy to say that it is the best messaging app i have used. :)

reply.author: Delicious
reply.content: Please email help@textra.me for an immediate solution! Thanks we'd appreciate that.

author: Create_The_World
comment: Amazing app could not reccomend thid anymore than i already can. I had problems with sending long messages using the built in samsung messaging app but using textra, wow it surprised me. It gives me a lot more capabilities with texting. Using a samsung i cant use some of the emojis i have with others who use another version of android. But textra comes with a feature where u can change the style of emojis which i day is a great touch. The level of customizability is tremendous and intuitive. Everything is easy to find and easy to change. It has a great notification system which i truely adore aswell. This might aswell be the greatest messaging app of all time in my opinion

reply.author: Delicious
reply.content: Thanks, very kind!
